DOC.brief_summary: To investigate relationship combine Lu AF35700 Lu AF36152 plasma concentration D2 dopamine receptor occupancy 172 hour oral dose Lu AF35700
DOC.brief_title: D2 Dopamine Receptor Occupancy After Oral Dosing Lu AF35700 Healthy Men Using 11C-PHNO Tracer Compound
